code: import{useFilter}from"../../context/filter-context";import"./Filter.css";import{FreeCancel}from"./FreeCancel/FreeCancel";import{PriceRange}from"./PriceRange/PriceRange";import{PropertyType}from"./PropertyType/ProperyType";import{Ratings}from"./Ratings/Ratings";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Filter=()=>{const{filterDispatch}=useFilter();const handleCloseFilterModal=()=>{filterDispatch({type:"SHOW_FILTER_MODAL"});};const handleClearFilterClick=()=>{filterDispatch({type:"CLEAR_ALL"});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-modal",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-page shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-center justify-space-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"filter-label",children:"Filter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-close button d-flex align-center justify-center cursor-pointer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:handleCloseFilterModal,className:"material-icons-outlined",children:"close"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PriceRange,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PropertyType,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Ratings,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FreeCancel,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-center justify-space-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button cursor btn-link-primary",onClick:handleClearFilterClick,children:"Clear All"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button cursor btn-primary btn-apply",onClick:handleCloseFilterModal,children:"Apply  All"})]})]})});};
